mapper.insert: insert into course_selection(student_no, course_plan_no, gmt_create) value (#{courseSelection.studentNo}, #{courseSelection.coursePlanNo}, #{courseSelection.gmtCreate});
mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(c.credit), 0) from course_selection cs inner join course_plan cp on cs.course_plan_no = cp.course_plan_no inner join course c on cp.course_no = c.course_no where cs.student_no = #{studentNo};

select c.course_name , c.credit , c.course_hours , t.teacher_name , cp.course_plan_year , cp.course_plan_no from course_selection cs inner join course_plan cp on cs.course_plan_no = cp.course_plan_no inner join course c on cp.course_no = c.course_no inner join teacher t on cp.teacher_no = t.teacher_no where cs.student_no = #{studentNo}
